name: ShareYourPaper
label: Paper deposit
description: ShareYourPaper.org uses self-archiving to make papers Open Access, for free, in minutes. It’s the simplest way to increase a paper’s impact for authors and libraries.
embed: Find the easiest way to share your paper

name: InstantILL
label: Inter-library loans
description: InstantILL makes Interlibrary Loan delivery faster, less expensive, and simpler for users. Libraries use it to deliver access without big deals, and it’s powering a global response to COVID-19 through RSCVD.

name: OAButton
label: Open Access delivery
tagline: Get around paywalls in a click.
description: OAButton gets you free access legally by scouring the web and emailing authors. Use it from tools on our website, plugins for Chrome and Firefox, or embedded into library systems.
embed: Avoid paywalls, request research
